title: What skins will be given out at Pax Aus?

replies.body:
Hey there,

The latest update from Riot about event presence in OCE was about pax 2015, [which they did not attend](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/2dzAlFg9-will-riot-be-at-pax-aus-2015?comment=0002). There are also no current plans to attend pax this time around, thus no free skins.

Sorry about that.
